STYLE_CONTAINER: #Container {background:QLinearGradient(x1:0, y1:0, x2:0, y2:1, stop:0 #73A2BD, stop:0.2 #eef) url(%HOME%/bg.png); border:3px solid #210C20; border-radius:11px;}
STYLE_BUTTON: QPushButton       {background-color:#BACDB2; padding:4px; border:1px solid #210C20; border-radius:3px;} QPushButton:checked {background-color:#8A9D82; padding:4px; border:1px solid #423842; border-radius:3px;} QPushButton:hover {background-color:#AABDA2;}
STYLE_LINEEDIT: QLineEdit        {background-color:#F2F2DA; border:1px solid #967C52; border-radius:4px;} QLineEdit:disabled      {color:#210C20; background-color:#eef;} QLineEdit:focus      {border:2px solid #967C52;}
STYLE_L_TEXTEDIT: QTextEdit      {background-color:#F2F2DA; border:1px solid #967C52; border-radius:4px;} QTextEdit:disabled      {color:#210C20; background-color:#eef;} QTextEdit:focus      {border:2px solid #967C52;}
STYLE_R_TEXTEDIT: QPlainTextEdit {background-color:#F2F2DA; border:1px solid #967C52; border-radius:4px;} QPlainTextEdit:disabled {color:#210C20; background-color:#eef;} QPlainTextEdit:focus {border:1px solid #967C52;}
